install.name: Active Groups
install.author: JomSocial Team
install.description: Display most active groups from groups that is created within JomSocial

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: count
param.label: Count
param.description: The number of active groups to display (default is 5)

param.name: show_avatar
param.label: Show avatar
param.description: Select whether to show the avatar

param.name: show_total
param.label: Show total members
param.description: Select whether to show the total members of the group.
